Package com.kolyadko.likeit.command.impl.actioncommand

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionCommand
    Abstract class for action commands (which are sent by POST request)
    ActivateProfileCommand
    Command lets activate user profile (admin only)
    BanProfileCommand
    Command lets ban user profile (admin only)
    CreateCommentCommand
    Command lets create a comment (authorized users only)
    CreateQuestionCommand
    Command lets create a question (authorized users only)
    CreateSectionCommand
    Command lets create a section (admin only)
    DeleteCommentCommand
    Command lets delete a comment (admin and comment's author only)
    DeleteProfileCommand
    Command lets delete user profile (current user only)
    DeleteQuestionCommand
    Command lets delete a question (admin and question's author only)
    DeleteSectionCommand
    Command lets delete a section (admin only)
    EditCommentCommand
    Command lets edit a comment (author only)
    EditProfileCommand
    Command lets edit a user profile (current user only)
    EditQuestionCommand
    Command lets edit a question (question's author only)
    EditSectionCommand
    Command lets edit a section (admin only)
    EmptyCommand
    Undefined command, throws an Exception on execution
    LoginCommand
    Command lets log in the system
    LogoutCommand
    Command lets log out from system
    NoteAsAnswerCommand
    Command lets note a comment as an answer (question's author only)
    RestoreCommentCommand
    Command lets restore a comment from archive (admin only)
    RestoreProfileCommand
    Command lets restore a user profile archive (admin only)
    RestoreQuestionCommand
    Command lets restore a question from archive (admin only)
    RestoreSectionCommand
    Command lets restore a section from archive (admin only)
    SetCommentMarkCommand
    Command lets set a comment mark (authorized only)
    SetQuestionMarkCommand
    Command lets set a question mark (authorized only)
    SignUpCommand
    Command lets sign up into system
    SimpleActionCommand
    Abstract class for simple action commands (action commands which don't need some intermediate data as Uncompleted...MemoryContainer between execution steps: 1. isAllowedAction() 2. isInputDataValid() 3. serviceCall()
